author: DebsMSurrey
title: Lovely little Hotel -
text:
The hotel is in a great location central to all the major sites, you can walk very easily everywhere and it's a great way to see more of this wonderful city.
The train station is about 10 mins walk at a slow pace. You can catch the train from Rome airport on the non stop train into central Rome, Termini station, fare 15 Euros, service very efficient, you can either buy tickets from a kiosk or from the machine which is very easy to use.
Hotel reception staff gave us a map and circled the main sites and how long to walk or go by train. Restaurants are everywhere, stayed for 4 nights and ate at different places all very good. Bowl of pasta varies from 5 - 9 Euros, if you are on a budget very cheap to eat out.
Breakfast at the hotel was very good. Coffee was served at the table and a good variety of food on offer, cooked breakfast was very nice.
Rooms were small but had everything needed. The only negative was the road was very busy and you could hear a lot during the night, but it's a city and we took in the atmosphere of this.
Would definitely stay here again.
Room Tip: Avoid rooms on the road, if traffic noise bothers you at night. See more room tips
